The answer is B

The answer is B

instruction: Q: How many seconds would it most likely take to get to Mars? Answer choices: A: 4000000000000000000000 seconds, B: 40 seconds, C: 400 seconds, D: 4 seconds

So, it would take approximately 225000000 km / 252000 km/h = 900 hours. Converting this to seconds, we get 900 hours x 3600 seconds/hour = 3240000 seconds.
